title: Batsu & Terry
synopsis: Bats & Terry are the two tough guys in the school. They don't take crap from anyone, not even teachers. They will fight anyone necessary, and will defend strangers (especially pretty girls) from danger. They're good at it too. Some people are in terror of them, and some love them.
staff: [['Ueda, Masuo', ['Producer']], ['Amino, Tetsuro', ['Director']], ['Ohira, Shinya', ['Key Animation']], ['Yamauchi, Noriyasu', ['Chief Animation Director']]]
